      • defaultIfEmpty

        public static <T> T defaultIfEmpty​(T[] array,
                                   T defaultValue)
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of array
        Parameters:
        array - an array
        defaultValue - a default value
        Returns:
        the default value if the array is empty or null, otherwise the value at index 0
